extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to deal with XML files.
    Author:

    Copyright A7 Software (http://a7-software.com/)
    Date : 09/02/2015.

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getDocument(java.io.File file)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns a Document from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        file - the XML file
        Returns:
        the XML document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error with the file
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if there was an error while parsing the XML document

      • getDocument

                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns a Document from an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream from which getting the XML content
        Returns:
        the XML document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error while getting the XML from the stream
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if there was an error while parsing the XML document
